title: Topic 002 Question 023
body: You are designing a near real-time dashboard solution that will visualize streaming data from remote sensors that connect to the internet. The streaming data must be aggregated to show the average value of each 10-second interval. The data will be discarded after being displayed in the dashboard.
The solution will use Azure Stream Analytics and must meet the following requirements:
✑ Minimize latency from an Azure Event hub to the dashboard.
What should you include in the solution? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point
